name: Grasshopper Farm
storyline: Players begin by entering a worn down Grasshopper Farm with a small population. Work with your loyal Swordsman and Farmer Hopper to venture out on idle quests in search of more treasure and more companions to join the Farm. Slowly gather resources and upgrade your buildings to grow the size of your Farm. Hire additional Grasshoppers to complete quests with ease. Venture to be the best Farmer in the land!
summary: A simple text-based Idle game hosted in Telegram. This game revolves around collecting fun and quirky blockchain Grasshoppers utilizing the Enjin ecosystem. Collect Grasshoppers, build your town, complete quests, and attack your opponents!
